name: Sitting around the world on a hot air balloon
name_original: Sitting around the world on a hot air balloon
description:
Travelling around the world on a hot air balloon.



Travel and to see the colorful world, such as: island castles, volcanic eruptions, city ruins, etc. When you raise your arms (more than 1 meter above the ground), the hot air balloon will move to follow your eye sights, and you can enjoy the view while exercising your arms too.
